element.title: REMn Front Page
element.FormLayout:
start:HideWhenMember

Vision: Racial equity across Minnesota.

Mission: Racial Equity Minnesota network participants unite in a collective effort offering programs and services resulting in individual and institutional behavioral changes shifting the state to a culture of bias free inclusion.

Operating Values: Mutual accountability; mutual sharing; open communication; commitment to continuous learning

Alignment for collective impact: REMn members collectively reach communities across the state to achieve racial equity and overcome bias. To succeed in a collective impact effort REMn participants will:

1. Share a Common Agenda: We have a shared vision to achieve racial equity across Minnesota. As participating organizations we will work collectively to provide program(s) and/or community access to achieve that vision.

2. Share Measurements: We will agree to collect data and measure outcomes consistently to improve programs; verify impact; and ensure accountability.

3. Mutually Reinforce Activities: Although similar but different in offerings, we will participate in joint marketing and delivery with Racial Equity Minnesota while continuing in our present business.

end:HideWhenMember

start:HideWhenNotMember

REMn Vision

Vision: Racial equity across Minnesota.

Mission: Racial Equity Minnesota network participants unite in a collective effort offering programs and services resulting in individual and institutional behavioral changes shifting the state to a culture of bias free inclusion.

Operating Values: Mutual accountability; mutual sharing; open communication; commitment to continuous learning

Alignment for collective impact: REMn members collectively reach communities across the state to achieve racial equity and overcome bias. To succeed in a collective impact effort REMn participants will:

1. Share a Common Agenda: We have a shared vision to achieve racial equity across Minnesota. As participating organizations we will work collectively to provide program(s) and/or community access to achieve that vision.

2. Share Measurements: We will agree to collect data and measure outcomes consistently to improve programs; verify impact; and ensure accountability.

3. Mutually Reinforce Activities: Although similar but different in offerings, we will participate in joint marketing and delivery with Racial Equity Minnesota while continuing in our present business.

element.title: HideWhenMember
element.Formula: # hide when member db=plominoDocument.getParentDatabase() user=db.getCurrentUser() if db.hasUserRole(user.id, '[controller]'): return True else: return False

element.title: Add New
element.Hidewhen: db = plominoDocument.getParentDatabase() user=db.getCurrentUser() not_sign_in = not db.hasUserRole(user.id, '[controller]') current_user_id = db.getCurrentUser().id if (current_user_id == "guest") or not_sign_in : return True
